channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Karoline Leavitt says she won't attend White House Correspondents' Association dinner
item.description: Karoline Leavitt said she would not attend the White House Correspondents' Association dinner, which President Donald Trump skipped in his first term.

item.title: To Help Ukraine, Slash U.S. Energy Red Tape
item.description: If Congress helped Europe break its addiction to Russian energy, everyone would win — except Putin.

item.title: Hegseth Guts Pentagon Office That Gifted Lucrative Contracts To Famed Russia Collusion Hoaxer

item.title: Covid Tyrants Were Perpetrators, Not Victims
item.description: The Covid 'experts' chose the unscientific tyranny of lockdowns, mandates, and petty, ineffective, legalistic rules, and they didn’t have to.

item.title: Trump enacts 18th century law to deport suspected Venezuelan gang members
item.description: President Trump invoked a centuries-old law to quickly detain and deport all Venezuelan migrants who are suspected of being part of the Tren de Aragua...

item.title: El Salvador takes in hundreds of Venezuelan gang members from US, even as judge moves to block deportations

item.title: Are We Ready for a Downsized D.C.?
item.description: It would be good for America if Washington became less powerful and less important. But getting there will be a challenge.

item.title: What ‘Freedom Conservatism’ Is Missing
item.description: Unfortunately, too many FreeCons have quietly sawed off one of the legs of American conservatism’s famous stool.

item.title: Democrats' favorable ratings drop to record low in new national poll
item.description: The Democratic Party's favorable ratings are falling to new lows, according to a new national poll.

item.title: Scuttled CDC Pick Slams Big Pharma And Senators On Its Payroll
item.description: Dr. Dave Weldon said concerns that Big Pharma was behind the fight against his nomination for CDC director were 'probably true.'

item.title: Why the West Needs the Jewish People
item.description: No one understands the task facing orthodox churches in the post-Christian West more than Jews.

item.title: Trump signs government funding extension, warding off another shutdown
item.description: President Trump signed Republicans' yearlong government funding extension, avoiding a partial government shutdown, the White House said Saturday.

item.title: Trump Slams ‘Communist’ Persecution Of Conservatives While Speaking At DOJ
item.description: 'Our predecessors turned this Department of Justice into the Department of Injustice. ... Those days are over.'

item.title: Detrans Awareness Day Heralds A Reckoning For Transgender ‘Medicine’ Fraudsters
item.description: Detransitioners' lawsuits against the medical systems that hurt them could finally undo the industry’s embrace of transgenderism.

item.title: Does Anyone Know What a Nazi Is?
item.description: Not if Elon Musk is considered one.
